What has my beloved <WH3039> to do in my house, <WH1004> since she has worked <WH6213> lewdness <WH4209> with many, <WH7227> and the holy <WH6944> flesh <WH1320> is passed <WH5674> from you? <WH7451> when you do evil, then you rejoice. <WH5937>

For Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> who planted <WH5193> you, <WH1696> has pronounced evil <WH7451> against you, <WH1558> because of the evil <WH7451> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and of the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> which they have worked <WH6213> for themselves in provoking me to anger <WH3707> by offering incense <WH6999> to Baal. <WH1168>
Yahweh <WH3068> gave me knowledge <WH3045> of it, <WH3045> and I knew it: <WH7200> then you showed me their doings. <WH4611>

But I was like a gentle <WH441> lamb <WH3532> that is led <WH2986> to the slaughter; <WH2873> and I didn't <WH3045> know that they had devised <WH2803> devices <WH4284> against me, <WH7843> saying, Let us destroy the tree <WH6086> with its fruit, <WH3899> and let us cut him off <WH3772> from the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> that his name <WH8034> may be no more remembered. <WH2142>

But, <WH3068> Yahweh of Armies, <WH6635> who judges <WH8199> righteously, <WH6664> who tests <WH974> the heart <WH3629> and the mind, <WH3820> I shall see <WH7200> your vengeance <WH5360> on them; <WH1540> for to you have I revealed my cause. <WH7379>

Therefore thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> concerning the men <WH582> of Anathoth, <WH6068> who seek <WH1245> your life, <WH5315> saying, <WH559> You shall not prophesy <WH5012> in the name <WH8034> of Yahweh, <WH3068> that you not die <WH4191> by our hand; <WH3027>

therefore thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> Behold, <WH6485> I will punish them: <WH970> the young men shall die <WH4191> by the sword; <WH2719> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> shall die <WH4191> by famine; <WH7458>
